data.title: Derby High School
data.text:
Derby Public Schools is launching several new programs for the 2024-2025 school year!

SEE MORE about What's New in 2024-2025?

Looking for volunteers who are interested in supporting our learning environment at Derby High School to greet students as they enter school, monitor hallways, make connections with students, and help promote a safe and supportive environment.

SEE MORE about Panther Watch

An overview of Derby High School's dress code policy is available or the full policy can be found on the Student Handbooks page.

SEE MORE about Derby High School Dress Code Policy

New for the 2024-2025 school year, the immunization exclusion date for students has been moved from November to September 3, 2024.

SEE MORE about New Immunization Exclusion Date for 2024-2025 School Year

The Kansas School Safety Hotline, 1 (877) 626-8203, can be used to anonymously report any potential school violence. The Kansas School Safety Hotline is there for you 24 hours per day, 365 days per year.

SEE MORE about Information on Reporting a Safety Tip

Congratulations to the Derby High School Air Force JROTC Unit # KS-06 on earning the Distinguished Unit Award and the “Silver Star” Community Service with Excellence Award for the academic year 2023-2024.

SEE MORE about Derby High School AFJROTC Receives Two National Honors
